column4: anyone else's opinions they don't like.
earl grey, darjeeling, or english breakfast?
ah.. don't have any of those in the cupboard
I'm a darjeeling person myself. I've been known to drink green tea on occasion, though.
hmm... you know what else is good, thai iced coffee
I live in a cold country, somehow cold drinks which aren't carbonated just don't seem appealing ;)
oh... well you should try it anyways
shall do. Any particular recommendations on how to make it or how to procure it?
ill have to ask next time i go
